### Face Recognition System for UE Caloocan
This project aims to develop a facial recognition system that automates attendance tracking for students and faculty while simultaneously enhancing campus security. By identifying unauthorized individuals, the system contributes to a safer environment and provides a more efficient method for managing attendance records.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenCV-white?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fpng%3Bbase64%2CiVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADAAAAAwCAYAAABXAvmHAAAACXBIWXMAAAsTAAALEwEAmpwYAAAElUlEQVR4nO2YzW8bRRjGN22TUAlaGuS1iVrg0BPXXJB6sOQZB0MECSQmTdQWiHfCh9QDf4FPKNkJqDKVkNLdCKTwUYwAceXCARSId1Kh8lGayG2TivbGoUGtQCIPGieY4t3XXsdg%2B%2BBXmov3mdnfs%2Fu%2B787YMDrRiU78Z4HDj%2B1HhJ1ClH0Kk1%2BHyX7fGRuIsk9K1x6O32O0Y8Dkk9ugHFWH1ph8wmiXgJHeC5O%2FVRPcZ4Tn9Nx2ePK5uuHLg51pLXyUje8efmfEEmOtgX803YMoLzZswGRXcTTV23wDJp%2Bokt%2FrMNlwyeTRVC%2FMxEjpNzqVxlth4DzZZQ4P9vn0%2FeyBUmsNNvBB8w1E2WogTISNknNiyTTxFi63wADfDDYQv5ec05c6QBjYbEUK3Q6EeWjoEDlHp1Fw2v3WijdQrLcg6cJna82l34b5kGyLsVTEp4%2BlIjD5tfYp4hhZkLqNLvv0Jl8m9RG68P8%2FA8ZAN0x2hXiiUz59lE0RBoow4vuabmAbig8FAF2Akd3j0xrZPTB5wf%2B2EiMtgS%2BDmVzeBbSFSPIYqY0kj5U0%2F9TLbHNpg6AMowsmt8MWo9b8DQ%2FD6DLaJUrp1D94pKauf%2FAIYvzJ5lAZhpH9MrvPWck863pi0fGsH13P%2BlUPR4nvXWW9e86zhvP5NjiYBMVCQTzhKFF0lUCN8YVRRyRmMfb4DB6ppdMaJlF%2FiwWMLldZbzie2AoBD1dNp8Osm85jL5M4yyXAJT6updeaktZGLpuFr7OR4XhChgMXcJT1lTYcZt274LeHjTgJbyNeoc2Fgtc5HRbe9aw%2FnRVrIMy6SYn0v4AkwCS%2B02%2BlUqufNrOhKvU69areJLd6utfxxLXwBsR8GPiBeXQziauVQFxDSbxUqec2Xg7SMhsb6Sx6yBu5BTFaBXbtnGdNON9kou8svxpzC%2BLkwoUXfZu2oOASk0FAfDs1lgIMLFF6ZoM%2BfrrKygfnuSg6SxnfMTFsMIl8IIzE2tAMfOcH%2FZu%2BRpg4TxvwxFqwgenndwtfMmDjCmFgtJ6a2RlF2oCy%2FggyMK%2BmH2zEAJe4EwQTP4P7qTmDb6KPMHCHvJGjrNtBBha%2FPX2AmqPrgOhQ5XMul7gVBJPKgVyXz%2BIgYeAWacBV1npgCnkZcu%2FirGTGicIv%2F9PAbVwO7EBzOL6Lwv%2BZNOB44iPiY3XR%2FXrqvkr92xdfOUTVjatEeWfKbbxPdJQbyTmYlesmXkeU27hJzFmk30BBnKT7vnXJLYjjuo3Oq%2BmDzkrmKf2Uw2wv%2BByeq9IWb3AbEzqddtJmkoKv%2BTGbV9PdjhIboT9ktNn1%2FA%2FpnooPGdUWUccoVv2QldJoJXOiYQMF4WuPSYlnGoK3scVtPF0VvmxCWQsNPH1y08UlZAMGZoy6DjFKuLuAP1vtcKM3adyGXe%2BTZxKzdW2ny29iJXPCUdbNWuCOJ37R7TTsugkbI2FqgkmsMolho5HIL72231XWC46yPneVuF465OhttBIbjrI%2BW%2FCsU3oXW%2B%2B6urATsxjjEu8xG5e4xKYeTOIn3Sr1Na1pCL4TneiE0fbxF8QJuHsHQEMrAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC)](#) ### Eli-5 Chatbot
The Eli-5 Chatbot is designed to simplify complex information. Inspired by the popular online forum, this chatbot uses advanced language processing to break down difficult topics into easy-to-understand explanations. Accessible through a user-friendly web interface, it aims to provide clear and informative answers to a wide range of questions.

<img src="assets/img/eli-5-chatbot.jpg?raw=true">

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Streamlit-white?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fpng%3Bbase64%2CiVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADIAAAAyCAYAAAAeP4ixAAAACXBIWXMAAAsTAAALEwEAmpwYAAADi0lEQVR4nO2YXYgVZRjHxzS%2FbiLKD7pwjZS%2B1FC8kkK8cnHP7pn%2F%2F%2B0lklIUUZFA2AqWwjYSxNtFvRC8ii5i8UIU7CYLupCIyuqij4soFbqw1EDOx%2FOe3JF3ds7snNPMOTOzu4dOzB9e9mLnfZ%2F39zz%2F951njuMUKlSoUKFC%2F1F5jrNAyNfrpHL6WQY4ZkjPH6572OlH1bReJ0CtCSLkHa9UetzpNwl5OazGDMwZp58kSr3aDuGDAP8I8MK8Ba67LoXc7Wm9eLZreVo%2FIuQfcSABzGdzsWdv796lotRrdu%2FTEAAigX5pAEOzCSDAqSSI5qgDL%2BcG0HqhKLXfkDfC9Vy3bAPvi%2FHy5brWT2cNYpTaau3TDcSQv3laL8sE4DgLgqT%2FGFPlA5ZwhQAm5p9GyAlrlVSBxscfEuDLFBDN8V6GBG0T4ItYq5JTVa3XTD9IXkj0NPmXIY%2FaknYMRr6RAcImqlolBzqtKUo9b8jJjuuQV8MJbeckaXxjXPfF2GpovVrIu1lA%2FAF8HLdelRwwwNmUNh2NbmSxALe6ZpGcMsCHlZGRJ1oyR74SZ89U6yn1UltCTqddy86vlctrW8tITmSwxT1DjnmDg0vCqrruswJ8mrkq5LWmbYW8mjERX%2F3bj8CWHJu4IcCe6Dp1ctgAv2e02CE7t0HuyBj%2F7djDZcjvcsDYzFwRYENokVJpuQDvC1lPWeHbnus%2B5u8BOJ82bs11n0oCGc0DEsA07AGNNoZ1cr2Qn6ScP%2BEfdK3XCFlJMefrWAg%2Fk8DKPIe2Pbvt13Uau9lESLm8MbD58RSxxhJBgtJenA1IxPffttxIKewm5JXmswa43tFWWq%2FrCGK%2F5uYEZGZzl6Ivvm52q5OuXxVyd4d1r3WECN8p5J9zDFOx1Yj2V4l2A361na3%2FmZzQlhjy3a4gaTvYnONm9LpOtBvwjr8PpTYLcD%2Bmas%2Bk7mLnCWS6QsDnotSmJLsJWWk2ggY41zb%2Fh1QQIQzw%2FTzD3Lftju2%2BE%2Bz2UeQm%2FTtP19wEeWs%2BQSLZv%2BNf19u3L2qxm%2F3hIrj1DPlmaCutn8sE4g0Pr%2FJfcj2ACc7FTw1yZ6Q66wU4Yb9zvIMHHzbAz%2FYZJ4%2Fs1dkzkJkxGX4oBZ%2B29m%2BD3CXkB%2FlAgC1Bp9tTGAGq%2FnVdKi1vccnQ0KNOXtW0ftJ6VMiTvR4GODIXv%2BwUKlSoUKFChQoVKvT%2F0gPxZSRwZA2r9AAAAABJRU5ErkJggg%3D%3D)

### Plant Pest Detection Model using YOLOv8
This project developed a custom YOLOv8 object detection model specifically designed to identify harmful insects, such as aphids, on plants. By leveraging advanced deep learning techniques, the model aims to provide accurate and timely detection of pests, enabling early intervention and effective pest management strategies. This model served as a crucial component of a larger thesis project focused on automated pest extermination using both audio and visual detection methods.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenCV-white?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fpng%3Bbase64%2CiVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADAAAAAwCAYAAABXAvmHAAAACXBIWXMAAAsTAAALEwEAmpwYAAAElUlEQVR4nO2YzW8bRRjGN22TUAlaGuS1iVrg0BPXXJB6sOQZB0MECSQmTdQWiHfCh9QDf4FPKNkJqDKVkNLdCKTwUYwAceXCARSId1Kh8lGayG2TivbGoUGtQCIPGieY4t3XXsdg%2B%2BBXmov3mdnfs%2Fu%2B787YMDrRiU78Z4HDj%2B1HhJ1ClH0Kk1%2BHyX7fGRuIsk9K1x6O32O0Y8Dkk9ugHFWH1ph8wmiXgJHeC5O%2FVRPcZ4Tn9Nx2ePK5uuHLg51pLXyUje8efmfEEmOtgX803YMoLzZswGRXcTTV23wDJp%2Bokt%2FrMNlwyeTRVC%2FMxEjpNzqVxlth4DzZZQ4P9vn0%2FeyBUmsNNvBB8w1E2WogTISNknNiyTTxFi63wADfDDYQv5ec05c6QBjYbEUK3Q6EeWjoEDlHp1Fw2v3WijdQrLcg6cJna82l34b5kGyLsVTEp4%2BlIjD5tfYp4hhZkLqNLvv0Jl8m9RG68P8%2FA8ZAN0x2hXiiUz59lE0RBoow4vuabmAbig8FAF2Akd3j0xrZPTB5wf%2B2EiMtgS%2BDmVzeBbSFSPIYqY0kj5U0%2F9TLbHNpg6AMowsmt8MWo9b8DQ%2FD6DLaJUrp1D94pKauf%2FAIYvzJ5lAZhpH9MrvPWck863pi0fGsH13P%2BlUPR4nvXWW9e86zhvP5NjiYBMVCQTzhKFF0lUCN8YVRRyRmMfb4DB6ppdMaJlF%2FiwWMLldZbzie2AoBD1dNp8Osm85jL5M4yyXAJT6updeaktZGLpuFr7OR4XhChgMXcJT1lTYcZt274LeHjTgJbyNeoc2Fgtc5HRbe9aw%2FnRVrIMy6SYn0v4AkwCS%2B02%2BlUqufNrOhKvU69areJLd6utfxxLXwBsR8GPiBeXQziauVQFxDSbxUqec2Xg7SMhsb6Sx6yBu5BTFaBXbtnGdNON9kou8svxpzC%2BLkwoUXfZu2oOASk0FAfDs1lgIMLFF6ZoM%2BfrrKygfnuSg6SxnfMTFsMIl8IIzE2tAMfOcH%2FZu%2BRpg4TxvwxFqwgenndwtfMmDjCmFgtJ6a2RlF2oCy%2FggyMK%2BmH2zEAJe4EwQTP4P7qTmDb6KPMHCHvJGjrNtBBha%2FPX2AmqPrgOhQ5XMul7gVBJPKgVyXz%2BIgYeAWacBV1npgCnkZcu%2FirGTGicIv%2F9PAbVwO7EBzOL6Lwv%2BZNOB44iPiY3XR%2FXrqvkr92xdfOUTVjatEeWfKbbxPdJQbyTmYlesmXkeU27hJzFmk30BBnKT7vnXJLYjjuo3Oq%2BmDzkrmKf2Uw2wv%2BByeq9IWb3AbEzqddtJmkoKv%2BTGbV9PdjhIboT9ktNn1%2FA%2FpnooPGdUWUccoVv2QldJoJXOiYQMF4WuPSYlnGoK3scVtPF0VvmxCWQsNPH1y08UlZAMGZoy6DjFKuLuAP1vtcKM3adyGXe%2BTZxKzdW2ny29iJXPCUdbNWuCOJ37R7TTsugkbI2FqgkmsMolho5HIL72231XWC46yPneVuF465OhttBIbjrI%2BW%2FCsU3oXW%2B%2B6urATsxjjEu8xG5e4xKYeTOIn3Sr1Na1pCL4TneiE0fbxF8QJuHsHQEMrAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC)](#) ### Predictive Analysis on Customer Buying Behavior
This project involved building a Random Forest model to predict customer purchasing patterns. By analyzing customer data, the model aims to identify future buying trends, enabling businesses to make informed decisions and optimize their marketing strategies. This project was undertaken as part of a Virtual Experience Program with British Airways through Forage.

<img src="assets/img/ba_predictive_analysis.png?raw=true">

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#) ### Customer Reviews Sentiment Analysis
This project applied Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to analyze customer reviews and determine overall sentiment towards British Airways. By extracting key insights from the text data, the project aimed to provide actionable feedback to the airline to enhance their services. This work was completed as part of a Virtual Experience Program with British Airways through Forage.

<img src="assets/img/ba_sentiment_analysis.png?raw=true">
<img src="assets/img/ba_sentiment_analysis_2.png?raw=true">
<img src="assets/img/ba_sentiment_analysis_3.png?raw=true">
